LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_UseSounds_Desc: Play sounds when performing various actions, such as adding/removing work or displaying messages.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ShowPrompt_Desc: When disabling or resetting work using the appropriate buttons, open an 'Are you sure?' dialogue window.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_MessageOnRemoval_Desc: If a work type is dragged away from a colonist's work list (and thus removed), display a message.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ButtonText_DisablePrompt: \n\nIf you disable this prompt, you can re-enable it in Options > Mod Settings.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ColonistHealthCompromised: <color=red>\n\nNAME is unable to do work of this type because of HIS health condition.</color>
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PrimeDraggable_DragTip:
Drag into any row to add <color=orange>{0}</color> (or update priority if it's already assigned).

If it can't be assigned, it will be indicated by a red line.

Shift-click to adjust priority for all assigned colonists.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PawnDraggable_DragTip:
Drag left or right to adjust priority.

Drag out of this row to remove.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_DisableWork_Text: All active work for NAME will be removed.\n\nNAME will become idle if you don't assign new work for HIM.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ResetWork_Text: All possible work types for NAME will be enabled and sorted by natural priority.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_PawnSurface_WorkTypeForbidden: Cannot assign NAME to {0}. HECAP is incapable of doing it.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ColonistStats_CurrentlyUnassi: \n\nNAME is currently unassigned from <color=orange>{0}</color>. HECAP is capable of doing it.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ColonistStats_WorkTypeForbidd: Cannot assign NAME to <color=orange>{0}</color>. HECAP is incapable of doing it.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_DisableWorkVisibleMap_Text: All work will be disabled for <color=red>ALL of the colonists on this map</color>.
LanguageData.DD_WorkTab_ResetWorkVisibleMap_Text: All work will be reset for <color=red>ALL of the colonists on this map</color>.
